mapper.select: select t3.*,t4.f_user_nickname as f_comment_r_nickname , t4.f_user_portriat as f_comment_r_portrait from ( select t1.*,t2.f_user_nickname as f_comment_nickname , t2.f_user_portriat as f_comment_portrait from ( select * from t_hp_article_comments where f_article_id = #{articleId} )t1 left join t_user t2 on t1.f_comment_uid = t2.f_uid )t3 left join t_user t4 on t3.f_comment_r_uid = t4.f_uid
mapper.delete: delete from t_hp_article_comments where f_article_id = #{articleId} and f_comment_uid = #{commentUid} and f_comment_time = #{commentTime}
